Name: Dish
Description: Coarse pottery saucer, with white accretions or residue over the interior surface, from a New Kingdom burial at Abydos. The burial occupied the lower north chamber of a rich shaft tomb, containing two early 18th Dynasty scarabs, a bronze ring and a carnelian bead in addition to the pottery and a small cosmetic vase for eye-paint. All four chambers in this shaft tomb had been robbed in antiquity.
